pages.title: Fruit Trees
pages.text: Several varieties of $(item)Fruit Trees/$ will generate rarely in the world, producing $(item)Fruit/$, as the name implies. However, not all varieties can be found naturally, and instead must be $(bold)$(l:farming/fruit_trees#hybrid)Hybridized/$ using $(thing)Bees/$, which is discussed later in this chapter.

Leaves on the tree will over time begin to flower, then bear fruit. This fruit can either be harvested manually by $(bold)Right Clicking/$, or it will drop to the ground after some time.$(br2)After some time, however, once around $(bold)80/$ $(item)Fruit/$ have dropped from the tree, the tree will stop bearing fruit, at which point new trees will need to be grown.

pages.title: Natural Generation
pages.text: The following $(thing)Trees/$ are available through natural generation:$(li)Cherry/$$(li)Apple Oak/$$(li)Lime/$$(li)Mandarin/$$(li)Citron/$$(br2)The specifics of each is detailed on further pages.

pages.title: Cherry Trees
pages.text: $(item)Cherry Trees/$ may generate rarely in $(thing)Warm Forests/$, or very rarely in $(thing)Plains/$.

pages.title: Apple Oak Trees
pages.text: $(thing)Apple Oak Trees/$ only generate in $(thing)Plains Villages/$. Additionally, a $(thing)Villager Child/$ may give you an $(item)Apple Oak Sapling/$ as a gift while you have $(thing)Hero of the Village/$.

pages.title: Citrus Trees
pages.text: $(item)Citrus Trees/$ may generate commonly in $(thing)Jungles/$, rarely in $(thing)Warm Forests/$, or very rarely in $(thing)Plains/$.$(br2)Note that only $(item)Lime/$, $(item)Citron/$, and $(item)Mandarin Trees/$ will generate naturally.

pages.title: Hybridization
pages.text: When bees polinate multiple different varieties of $(item)Fruit Trees/$, if they are compatible, there is a chance that one of the polinated $(item)Leaves/$ will $(thing)Hybridize/$ into another variety of fruit tree.$(br2)$(item)Citrus Trees/$ may $(thing)Hybridize/$ amongst themselves, and $(item)Cherry/$ and $(item)Apple Oak Trees/$ with each other.
$(bold)$(l:getting_started/ponder)Ponder/$ any $(item)Fruit Tree Sapling/$ for more information. Also search $(bold)'Hybrids'/$ in $(jei) for specific hybridization recipes.
